channel.title: TTC Service Alerts
channel.description: Live service alerts for the Toronto Transit Commission

item.title: ðŸš‡ Line 2 Bloor-Danforth: This weekend, starting at 11:59 p.m. tonight, there will be no subway service between Keele and St George stations due to planned track work. Shuttle buses will operate.
item.description: Line 2 Bloor-Danforth: This weekend, starting at 11:59 p.m. tonight, there will be no subway service between Keele and St George stations due to planned track work. Shuttle buses will operate.

item.title: ðŸš‡ Line 2 Bloor-Danforth: No service between Keele and St George stations while we respond to an injury on the tracks. Shuttle buses are running between Keele and St George.
item.description: Customers can use GO Transit service for the cost of a TTC fare at neighboring GO Transit stations at Kipling, Dundas West and Union stations, as well as Mimico GO Station.

item.title: ðŸš‡ Line 6 Finch West: Delays between Finch West and Tobermory stations while the maintainer fixes a track switch issue. Shuttle buses are running between Finch West and Driftwood.
item.description: Line 6 Finch West: Delays between Finch West and Tobermory stations while the maintainer fixes a track switch issue. Shuttle buses are running between Finch West and Driftwood.

item.title: ðŸš‹ 510 Spadina: Streetcars have been replaced by buses between Spadina Station Streetcar Platform and Queens Quay West at Lower Spadina Ave East Side due to emergency overhead power repairs.
item.description: 510 Spadina: Streetcars have been replaced by buses between Spadina Station Streetcar Platform and Queens Quay West at Lower Spadina Ave East Side due to emergency overhead power repairs.

item.title: ðŸšŒ 47 Lansdowne: Detour via Caledonia Park Rd, Davenport Rd, Symington Ave and Dupont St due to a collision.
item.description: 47 Lansdowne: Detour via Caledonia Park Rd, Davenport Rd, Symington Ave and Dupont St due to a collision.

item.title: ðŸšŒ 72 Pape: Detour northbound via Dundas St E, Jones Ave and Danforth Ave due to emergency watermain repairs.

item.title: ðŸšŒ 100 Flemingdon Park: Delays near Overlea Blvd at Thorncliffe Park Dr (West) due to traffic congestion.

item.title: ðŸšŒ 126 Christie: Detour via Bloor St W, Ossington Ave and Dupont St due to a blocked road.

item.title: ðŸšŒ 134 Progress: Detour northbound via Bushby Dr, Consilium Pl and Corporate Dr due to a collision.

item.title: ðŸ¢ Line 1 Yonge-University: Subway trains will move slower than usual southbound from Eglinton to Davisville stations while we work on track issues.

item.title: â™¿ St Clair: Elevator 16Y2L out of service between concourse and Line 1 northbound platform due to the Ontario Line construction. Elevator is expected to be back in service March 30, 2026.
